message: "MICROSOFT IGNITES BLOCKBUSTER GAMES EXCITEMENT AND UNVEILS MORE MAGIC FOR KINECT AT GAMESCOM 2011. European momentum grows as Xbox 360 continues to transform entertainment for everyone" Does anyone even need to see the full press release?
Does anyone still care about Kinect?

Let me rephrase that.

Does anyone still care about official Kinect games?
New "Value" PSP announced. 99 Euros, compatible with the entire library of games.
Also, PS3 pricecut of $50. I plan to buy one next month, so the timing is spot on.
